Official Word On The Playmates Toys MR Plush Figures
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2001 Topics (Year Of The Heart Crystal): Official Word On The Playmates Toys MR Plush Figures
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, June 14, 2001 - 09:51 am:

A while back I decided to email Playmates Toys and ask them about the plush MR figures that still say "coming soon" on their website. These figures were shown at Toy Fair in February 2000. I just recieved an email response:

"I am sorry but the Monster Rancher Plush were not produced after being shown
at Toy Fair
-Paula Billingsley"

So that's it guys, looks like they have been shelved indefinitely.
